about.intro: Hey there! I'm Rakesh – a Senior Architect with 15+ years of experience designing enterprise-scale solutions. Currently a Trusted Advisor at Red Hat, I help organizations architect their cloud transformation journey, turning complex requirements into elegant, scalable platforms.
about.expertise: I specialize in designing multi-cloud architectures (AWS, Azure, OpenShift) that balance performance, security, and cost. My approach: pragmatic architecture over theoretical purity – solving real problems with solutions that operations teams can actually maintain. I've architected platforms serving thousands of developers across banking, government, and enterprise sectors.
about.personal: When I'm not whiteboarding solutions, I'm likely planning my next travel adventure with my family, discovering new cuisines, or chasing after my little ones. I share deep-dives on architecture patterns, cloud-native technologies, and lessons learned on my blog.
